articles.title: ROC face to face with SA's only Shelby Speedster - Carmag South Africa

articles.author: John Wagner, Mariana Alfaro
articles.title: Post Politics Now: Gun violence victims testify in House; Biden to host Summit of the Americas - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Biden is heading to Los Angeles to host the Summit of the Americas, a gathering of western hemisphere nations. While in the city, he'll appear on Jimmy Kimmel's late-night talk show.
articles.content: Roy Guerrero, a pediatrician from Uvalde, Tex., who treated several of the Robb Elementary School shooting victims, testified Wednesday about horrific gunshot wounds he saw and the communitys searing… [+1535 chars]

articles.title: Biden and Bolsonaro to have awkward first meeting at Americas summit - Reuters
articles.description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro and his U.S. counterpart Joe Biden have never seen eye-to-eye, but they have agreed to an awkward, hastily arranged meeting in Los Angeles on Thursday for their own different motives.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES/BRASILIA, June 8 (Reuters) - Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro and his U.S. counterpart Joe Biden have never seen eye-to-eye, but they have agreed to an awkward, hastily arranged meeting… [+4370 chars]
